status.generatingImage: Creating image. May take a moment.

auth.termsPasswordStep: By continuing, you agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
auth.termsAgeStep: By clicking "Continue", you agree to our Terms and have read our Privacy Policy.

aside.title: Build and iterate with AI conversations that stay organized.
aside.description: A fast workspace for prompts, files, and model-driven responses with secure session handling built in.
aside.feature1: Structured chat history and model switching
aside.feature2: Streaming answers with edit and regenerate flow

login.descriptionEmail: Sign in to continue your conversations.

signup.descriptionCode: Enter the {codeLength}-digit verification code we sent to {email}.
signup.descriptionAge: This helps us personalize your experience and keep Navid AI safe.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email to receive reset instructions.
forgotPassword.sentMessage: We sent a reset link to {email}.

resetPassword.title: Set a new password
resetPassword.description: Choose a strong password you have not used before.
resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: This link is missing a reset token. Request a new one.

validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.birthDateFormat: Enter your birth date as MM/DD/YYYY.
validation.mustBeAdult: You must be at least 18 years old to use Navid AI.

toasts.passwordUpdated: Password updated. Sign in with your new password.
toasts.newCodeSent: A new code was sent to {email}.

generic.rootDescription: Try reloading this view. If the issue persists, check logs and API health.
generic.sectionDescription: We hit an unexpected issue while loading this section.

auth.signupSessionExpired: Signup session expired. Please start again.
auth.failedContinue: Failed to continue. Please try again.

chat.unavailableDescription: Try refreshing this page or return to chat home.

settings.failedLoadProfileDescription: Refresh this page and try again.

attachments.maxFileSize: Each file must be less than {sizeMb}MB.
attachments.unsupportedType: Unsupported file type. Use images, PDF, or text documents.

workspace.title: Workspace error
workspace.description: We could not complete this action in the chat workspace. Retry to recover.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: The page you requested does not exist or may have been moved.

chat.title: Chat workspace
chat.description: Create a new conversation or continue from recent history.
chat.emptyDescription: Choose a model and send a message. You can upload images or documents to provide context.
chat.noConversationsPanel: No conversations yet. Start one to begin chatting.
homeHeading: Hey, [User Shortname]. Ready to dive in?

help.title: Help center
help.description: Browse onboarding guidance, prompt patterns, and troubleshooting notes.

settings.profileDescription: Manage your account identity and display preferences.
settings.profileCardDescription: Your email is managed by your authentication provider.
settings.preferencesCardDescription: These settings apply to new chats.

onboarding.intentDescription: We'll use this information to suggest ideas you might find useful.
onboarding.goalsTitle: What do you want to do with Navid?
onboarding.goalsDescription: Pick one or more options so we can tailor your first suggestions.

quickTour.readyDescription: Navid can make mistakes. Review important details before acting on responses.
quickTour.readyLegal: By continuing, you agree to our Terms and have read our Privacy Policy.

ask.title: Ask anything
ask.description: From quick questions to big ideas, Navid is here to help.
ask.prompt: Suggest weeknight dinner ideas that are trendy and quick
ask.responseHeading: Here are three fast options you can try tonight:
ask.point1: One-pan baked feta pasta with cherry tomatoes and basil.
ask.point2: Sheet-pan lemon garlic salmon with mixed vegetables.
ask.point3: Spicy chickpea tacos with avocado and lime.

picture.title: Picture this
picture.description: Describe an idea and watch it come to life, or edit a photo with one phrase.
picture.prompt: Turn this photo into a 3D cartoon

uploads.title: Easy uploads
uploads.description: Get instant summaries or analysis by uploading images and documents.
uploads.prompt: What does my lease say about quiet hours?
uploads.answer: Your lease says quiet hours are from 10:00 PM to 8:00 AM daily, and repeated violations can count as a material breach.

landing.heroDescription: Navid is a next-generation language model built for speed, deep reasoning, and precise results across coding, analysis, writing, and problem-solving.

prompts.p3: Write a formal email for me
prompts.p5: Create a study plan for the entrance exam

intelligence.title: Navid is an intelligent system designed to handle complex tasks, generate visuals, and respond with deep personalization while adapting to your needs with a remarkably human touch.
intelligence.description: Whether you're crafting ideas, solving challenges, or simply exploring, Navid understands your context.

standout.title: Smarter responses. Stunning visuals. Always adaptive.
standout.description: Navid provides powerful, personalized support that feels intuitive and responsive.

cards.complexityDescription: Navid understands layers of context, nuance, and intent so you can move through hard problems with clarity and speed.
cards.visualsDescription: From abstract ideas to polished outputs, Navid turns your prompts into compelling visuals ready to share and iterate.
cards.personalizedDescription: Responses adapt to your style, goals, and domain context so every interaction feels natural, precise, and useful.

imageGeneration.title: Describe it, and watch your imagination come to life with stunning detail.
imageGeneration.description: Navid understands even complex visual prompts and transforms abstract, surreal, or hyper-specific ideas into production-ready image outputs.
imageGeneration.step1Alt: A towering stone monolith in a dramatic mountain valley
imageGeneration.step1Prompt: A towering, majestic stone monolith that rises high into the sky. The structure exudes an air of mysticism with intricate carvings and ancient markings.
imageGeneration.step2Alt: A futuristic city with glowing structures at dusk
imageGeneration.step2Prompt: A futuristic skyline at dusk with luminous architecture, reflective canals, and cinematic atmospheric fog across the horizon.
imageGeneration.step3Alt: A surreal desert scene with advanced sci-fi machinery
imageGeneration.step3Prompt: A surreal desert with colossal sci-fi machinery buried in sand, dramatic lighting, and ultra-detailed textures in a wide cinematic composition.

engine.title: Unleashing the Power of Navid Intelligence Stack
engine.metricTitle: Faster Response Time and Generative Accuracy
engine.card1Description: Enhance image generation throughput up to 40% with optimized inference routing.
engine.card2Description: Handle deep research tasks with richer context synthesis and faster retrieval.
engine.card3Description: Built on modern model techniques for reliable reasoning and responsive output.
engine.rightTitle: Faster than ever before, delivering results in seconds
engine.rightDescription: With improved efficiency and responsiveness, every interaction feels natural and instantaneous, making it easier to achieve your goals quickly and effortlessly.
